page.title: 12COUNTRY GARAGE
page.content: MR. HASSAL WAS INTERVEID BY TAMSIN HEYWOOD AND JENNIFER DARVILL.HE HAS WORKED AT THE GARAGE FOR 3 YEARS. THE GARAGE IS SITUATED IN MAIN ROAD. HE SELLS SECOND HAND CARS.THE SHIPMENTS COME IN AT ANY TIME OF THE MONTH .IN ALL HIS TIME AT THE GARAGE HE SAYS THAT MERCEDES ARE THE BEST SELLING CARS HE HAS EVER HAD. THE WORST CARS TO SELL ARE CALLED PANTHERS. RED IS THE MOST POPULAR COLOUR. HIS BEST CUSTOMER IS A COMPANY IN {LONDON}.HE HAS JUST HAD HIS GARAGE MODERNISED THIS YEAR AND NOW HAS A LARGE SHOWROOM TYPE OF WINDOW. MR.HASSAL DOES NOT EMPLOY ANYONE ELSE. THERE IS ONLY ONE OTHER GARAGE IN THE VILLAGE THAT SELLS NEW CARS--{ {KENNINGS}--ON THE ROAD TO HOPE. { { }
